content: I think I'll try out the Java Moss and Water Wisteria. I've heard great things about Java Moss and it seems like it would be a great choice for creating a lush, carpeting effect. The Water Wisteria sounds like it would be a great choice for providing hiding places and food for my fish. Also, I like the idea of training it to grow on the driftwood branch I recently added to the tank. Do you have any tips on how to care for these plants and keep them healthy?
